body:
What steps will reproduce the problem? 1. Cast Esperzoa. What is the expected output? What do you see instead? Esperzoa should have flying but, doesn't and can be blocked by creatures without flying/reach. What version of the product are you using? On what operating system? Magarena 1.36
Windows 7 64-bit
author: [Vampiric...@gmail.com](https://code.google.com/u/100888787182735301774/)
title: Esperzoa doesn't have flying.

comments.body:
Thanks for reporting this bug. The flying ability was missing in Esperzoa's script, fixed in https://code.google.com/p/magarena/source/detail?r=c6f2f9e7a4abac580a7e54c6d187bcbab425e807

**Status:** Fixed
comments.author: [melvinzh...@gmail.com](https://code.google.com/u/108278210804167927868/)

content:
